column1: Welcome to the Open-Closed Eyes Experiment!\n\nThis is designed for the Wireless EEG and EMG devices.
Please relax and remain still during the experiment while we record your baseline brain activity.
Follow the on-screen instructions to open or close your eyes as prompted.\n\nWe will do this twice, with each round lasting 5 minutes.
During the eyes-open section,\nlook steadily at the cross mark in the center of the screen.

For the eyes-closed section,
you'll close your eyes for the given duration.

Please avoid falling asleep!
The trial will begin on the following screen.\n\nPlease let us know if you have any remaining questions.
